newsitem.title: NORWAY: ATHLETICS-KIPKETER PULLS OUT OF BISLETT GAMES.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-KIPKETER PULLS OUT OF BISLETT GAMES.

text.p: World 800 metres champion Wilson Kipketer has angered organisers and sponsors by withdrawing from the Bislett Games on July 4, the NTB news agency reported on Monday.
Kipketer's clash with Norway's Olympic champion Vebjoern Rodal had been billed as the race of the meeting.
According to NTB, Kipketer said the meeting did not suit his schedule, Kipketer's agent Andrei Kulikowski told Danish media there had been no agreement between Kipketer and the Bislett organisers.
Kulikowski's statement was rejected by meeting director Svein Arne Hansen.

"We have both a written and verbal agreement, which I can of course prove," Hansen told NTB. "I have been in these games for 20 years. I have never experienced anything like this, we cannot let it go."
